id: 122
text: OVID-19 deaths) or migration. It partitions the population in 11 mutually exclusive and exhaustive compartments (Figure 1(a)): • Susceptible (S): People who are susceptible to SARS-CoV-2 infection. • Exposed (E): Early-infected persons who are not yet contagious and are in the incubation period.• Infected (I): People currently infected and contagious. • Undetected (UR and (UD): Infected people who are not detected (and are not counted among the known cases) because they did not get tested. I
